title.text: Project 2003 Service Pack 2 for Multilingual User Interface Pack

description.text: Microsoft Office Project 2003 Service Pack 2 (SP2) for Multilingual User Interface Pack ensures that Project 2003 performs with complete functionality when you use a Project 2003 Multilingual User Interface Pack. This update applies to the following product: Microsoft Office Project 2003 Multilingual User Interface Pack.
